intro: Cnestis grandiflora, commonly known as the large-flowered cnestis, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its showy, clustered white to pink flowers that bloom in summer. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and often covered with fine hairs. Cnestis grandiflora is typically found in moist, shaded habitats such as forests and along stream banks.
